name: THE LOST PIKE: THE LABYRINTHE
description:
Here is a 3D simple exploration game.

You have to find 4 PIKES. Those pikes are hidden inside a huge labyrinthe.

Each time you find a Pike you become faster.

In order to help you find the pike, you will have to be careful of the sounds!!

Once you have found the 4 pikes. you will be able to GET OUT of the labyrinthe! 

But will you find the exit?!!

This is a third person game where you control the Unreal Explorator.

This game has been made with Unreal ENGINE 4, Blender 3D by OEDIPE GAMES.

I hope you can enjoy this game as much as I enjoy making it!
